Uses of Interface
com.github.sttk.cliargs.CliArgs.InvalidOption

Packages that use CliArgs.InvalidOption
Package
Description
com.github.sttk.cliargs
Provides the classes to parse and print comand line arguments.
com.github.sttk.cliargs.convert
Provides the classes to convert option arguments to typed values.

  • Uses of CliArgs.InvalidOption in com.github.sttk.cliargs

    Classes in com.github.sttk.cliargs that implement CliArgs.InvalidOption
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static final record 
    CliArgs.FailToConvertOptionArg
    Is the exception reason which indicates that an option argument is failed to convert the specified type value.
    static final record 
    CliArgs.OptionHasInvalidChar
    Is the exception reason which indicates that an invalid character is found in an option.
    static final record 
    CliArgs.OptionIsNotArray
    Is the exception reason which indicates that an option is input with an option argument multiple times though its option configuration specifies the option is not an array (.isArray == false).
    static final record 
    CliArgs.OptionNeedsArg
    Is the exception reason which indicates that an option is input with no option argument though its option configuration requires option argument (.hasArg == true).
    static final record 
    CliArgs.OptionTakesNoArg
    Is the exception reason which indicates that an option is input with an option argument though its option configuration does not accept option arguments (.hasArg == false).
    static final record 
    CliArgs.UnconfiguredOption
    Is the exception reason which indicates that there is no configuration about the input option.

  • Uses of CliArgs.InvalidOption in com.github.sttk.cliargs.convert

    Classes in com.github.sttk.cliargs.convert that implement CliArgs.InvalidOption
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static final record 
    BigDecimalConverter.InvalidBigDecimalFormat
    Is the exception reason which indicates that the option argument is invalid format as an big decimal value.
    static final record 
    BigIntConverter.InvalidBigIntFormat
    Is the exception reason which indicates that the option argument is invalid format as a big integer value.
    static final record 
    ByteConverter.InvalidByteFormat
    Is the exception reason which indicates that the option argument is invalid format as a byte.
    static final record 
    DoubleConverter.InvalidDoubleFormat
    Is the exception reason which indicates that the option argument is invalid format as a double.
    static final record 
    FloatConverter.InvalidFloatFormat
    Is the exception reason which indicates that the option argument is invalid format as a float.
    static final record 
    IntConverter.InvalidIntegerFormat
    Is the exception reason which indicates that the option argument is invalid format as an integer.
    static final record 
    LongConverter.InvalidLongFormat
    Is the exception reason which indicates that the option argument is invalid format as an long value.
    static final record 
    ShortConverter.InvalidShortFormat
    Is the exception reason which indicates that the option argument is invalid format as a short value.
